titleStmt.title: The mirrour of mercy in the midst of misery, or, Life triumphant in death, wherein free-will is abolished, and free-grace exalted with the large wonders of loves wounds / written in a fit of sicknesse by Jeremiah Rich.
titleStmt.author: Rich, Jeremiah, d. 1660?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Nath. Brook ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, tightly bound, with loss of print.
